solution_line_template: In the rooms for couples, there are {num_couple_rooms} rooms * {people_per_couple_room} people per room = <<{num_couple_rooms}*{people_per_couple_room}={people_in_couple_rooms}>>{people_in_couple_rooms} people.

So in total, there are {people_in_couple_rooms} people in couples' rooms + {num_single_rooms} people in single rooms = <<{people_in_couple_rooms}+{num_single_rooms}={total_people}>>{total_people} people in the hotel.

As each person gets a bubble bath, Isabelle will need a total of {total_people} baths * {ml_per_bath}ml of bubble bath per bath = <<{total_people}*{ml_per_bath}={total_bubble_bath_needed}>>{total_bubble_bath_needed}ml of bubble bath.
